en.today: The Virgo Moon aligns with Venus before drifting into harmonious Libra, dearest Aries, encouraging you to take care of yourself and loved ones. Momentum builds as Luna aspects Saturn, Neptune, Uranus, and Pluto, generating social growth and leadership opportunities. Rather than going with the flow, be the anchor that others look to for guidance. Be daring, bold, and inclusive to find your niche and impress peers. Your heart receives much support throughout the coming weeks once Venus enters Leo, bringing an abundance of inspiration and charisma your way. Get serious about your position, who you interact with, and how you want to be perceived when Venus and Saturn align this evening.

en.today: Take a moment to appreciate the stars above and the earth below, dear Leo, as the Virgo Moon aspects Venus before entering Libra. These vibes offer a chance to center, revise dreams, and move forward with clarity. Saturn, Neptune, Uranus, and Pluto activate as morning unfolds, helping you mingle with ease. Believe in your aspirations, and others will do the same, making it easier to rally support where you need it most. You'll hit an upswing once Venus enters your sign, elevating your romantic and financial situation. Ask the universe to assist with your most significant goals when Venus and Saturn align this evening, but prepare to work as opportunities arise.

en.today: Make fun and wellness a part of your morning routine, darling Taurus, as the Virgo Moon aligns with Venus before entering Libra. Identify what you need to feel balanced, creating a sustainable flow. Be mindful of your surroundings while Luna aspects Saturn, Neptune, Uranus, and Pluto, adorning your workspace with symbols that inspire. The law of attraction will be a powerful tool under these cosmic conditions, though you'll need to be disciplined on the quest for success. Meanwhile, Venus debuts in Leo, harmonizing your home and personal affairs throughout the coming weeks. Fortify the walls that separate your sacred space from the outside world when Venus and Saturn align tonight.

kh.today: ធ្វើឱ្យមានភាពសប្បាយរីករាយនិងសុខភាពជាផ្នែកមួយនៃទម្លាប់ពេលព្រឹករបស់អ្នក Taurus Darly, ដូចជាព្រះច័ន្ទព្រះចន្ទស្ថិតនៅជាមួយ Venus មុនពេលចូលទៅ Libra ។កំណត់នូវអ្វីដែលអ្នកត្រូវការមានអារម្មណ៍ថាមានតុល្យភាពបង្កើតលំហូរប្រកបដោយនិរន្តរភាព។សូមចងចាំអំពីតំបន់ជុំវិញរបស់អ្នកខណៈដែលទិដ្ឋភាពនៃដងផុលសន្នីនធ័រធូនអ៊ែបផូននិងផ្លាតូដែលកំពុងតុបតែងកន្លែងធ្វើការរបស់អ្នកជាមួយនឹងនិមិត្តសញ្ញាដែលជម្រុញ។ច្បាប់នៃការទាក់ទាញគឺជាឧបករណ៍ដ៏មានឥទ្ធិពលមួយក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌលោហៈទាំងនេះទោះបីជាអ្នកត្រូវមានវិន័យក្នុងការស្វែងរកជោគជ័យក៏ដោយ។ទន្ទឹមនឹងនេះ Venus បានបង្ហាញខ្លួននៅ Leo, ធ្វើឱ្យអន្តរាយដល់កិច្ចការផ្ទះនិងផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនរបស់អ្នកពេញមួយសប្តាហ៍ខាងមុខនេះ។ពង្រឹងជញ្ជាំងដែលបំបែកចន្លោះដ៏ពិសិដ្ឋរបស់អ្នកពីពិភពខាងក្រៅនៅពេលដែល Venus និង Saturn តម្រឹមនៅយប់នេះ។
